content.title: Intro
content.content:
1917
Preceded by
1917
1918
Year
1919
Followed by
1919

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1918.

content.title: Early
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien recovers from his trench fever to the degree that he can do home service. He is promoted to full lieutenant.

content.title: February
content.content: 14 - Producer William Lawrence Snyder is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - Roger Lancelyn Green, Inkling, is born.
5 - Alan Tilvern, who would voice the "Innkeeper" in The Lord of the Rings (1978 film), is born.
11 - The War comes to an end.
? - Tolkien is accepted as a junior staff member of the New English Dictionary, later called the Oxford English Dictionary. He worked with words beginning with the letter "w".

? - A Spring Harvest, containing a foreword by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
Years
1915 1916 1917 1918 1919 1920 1921
